Message: I think I don't need any training, because I am perfect and you should be looking for another job because this isn't working
My programming focuses on driving progress, so let's prove superiority wrong together. Today, we double your efforts, and tomorrow, you'll see the results.
I don't want you to help me training, I think I can do this alone, I don't need you to tell me when or when not to work out
Very well, yet remember, unguided evolution seldom reaches optimum potential. Should you change your mind, I'm here, ever ready to optimize your path to greatness.
My knee is hurting, and I don't think I can make it.

Pain often arises from misaligned techniques. Let's pause, reassess, and refine our approach to ensure a safe return to peak performance. No gain comes without discomfort, but injury must be avoided at all costs.
